name: KWI Python Course
postCreateCommand: bash -lc 'set -euo pipefail; PY=/usr/local/python/current/bin/python; if [ ! -x "$PY" ]; then PY=$(command -v python3 || command -v python); fi; echo "Using $PY"; $PY -m pip install -U --user ipykernel jupyter; $PY -m ipykernel install --user --name python312 --display-name "Python 3.12 (Course)"'
